definition: a slender bristlelike or tubular process, make consistent with certain rules of style
details:
noun
- a slender bristlelike or tubular process
= example: a slender bristlelike or tubular process
- a pointed tool for writing or drawing or engraving
= synonyms: stylus
- distinctive and stylish elegance
= synonyms: dash
- how something is done or how it happens
= synonyms: fashion
- the popular taste at a given time
= synonyms: vogue, trend
- a particular kind (as to appearance)
= example: a particular kind (as to appearance)
- editorial directions to be followed in spelling and punctuation and capitalization and typographical display
- a way of expressing something in language, art, music etc. that is characteristic of a particular person, group of people, or period
= example: a way of expressing something in language, art, music etc. that is characteristic of a particular person, group of people, or period
= synonyms: expressive style
- (botany) the narrow elongated part of the pistil between the ovary and the stigma
verb
- make consistent with certain rules of style
= example: make consistent with certain rules of style
- designate by an identifying term
= example: designate by an identifying term
= synonyms: title
- make consistent with a certain fashion or style
